title: #299 - Slavoj Zizek Returns
itunes:title: #299 - Slavoj Zizek Returns
description: These days, Zizek is a little difficult to ignore. He's a philosophical superstar, he's got manic energy, and he loves talking about movies. It seems only fitting that Connor and Dan dedicate an entire episode to discussing his background and thoughts on ideology and politics.
